contentHtml:
Add Array Item

For indexed arrays:

  • Use the bracket syntax.

For associative arrays:

  • Use brackets for the key, and assign value with the = operator.
<?php

$fruits = ['Apple', 'Orange', 'Banana'];
$fruits[] = "Cherry";

$vegetables = [
    "Kale" => 12,
    "Spinach" => 6
];
$vegetables["Broccoli"] = 3;

?>

Add Multiple Array Items

For indexed arrays:

  • Use the array_push() function. For associative arrays:
  • Use the += operator.
<?php

$fruits = ["Apple"];
array_push($fruits, "Banana", "Cherry");

$vegetables = [
    "Kale" => 12
];
$vegetables += [
    "Spinach" => 5,
    "Broccoli" => 6
];

?>
title: Add Array Items
